vectors: small utilities users repeatedly search for
exploration_config.non_repetition_check: Non-repetition check performed by varying domain lenses and query families; no leaderboard content used.

trends.name: Simplicity Over Features
trends.description: Users increasingly reject feature-heavy apps in favor of single-purpose tools that excel at one task
trends.evidence: Chrome extension reviews emphasize 'does one thing well' philosophy; meal planning app users complain about 'too many features' causing decision paralysis; packing apps praised for 'straightforward and easy to use' over 'bells and whistles'

trends.name: Offline-First Demand
trends.description: Growing preference for apps that work without internet connectivity, especially for productivity and learning
trends.evidence: Travel app users seek 'works on airplane' functionality; language learning complaints about online-only requirements; simple timer apps for kids valued for local functionality

trends.name: Parent-Child App Fatigue
trends.description: Parents seeking simple, engaging apps for kids that don't overwhelm with complexity
trends.evidence: Timer apps for kids focus on 'fun and easy-to-use' design; parents request 'uncomplicated, child-friendly interfaces'; visual timers valued over complex scheduling

market_research.monetization_trends: Subscription fatigue drives preference for simple, focused apps with clear value propositions. Users willing to pay for apps that save time through simplicity rather than comprehensive feature sets.

app_ideas.name: PackSimple
app_ideas.signal_source: App Store reviews: 'PackPoint always wants to drop you into the screen for creating a packing list, even when that's not what you want to do' and 'a lot of other UI annoyances that collectively make the app more tedious than it needs to be'
app_ideas.description: Dead-simple packing app that focuses solely on creating and checking off items. Discovery Mode: Practical Utility | Ship Profile: Client-only
app_ideas.target_user: Frequent travelers frustrated with complex packing apps
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Users prefer 'straightforward and easy to use' apps over those with 'bells and whistles'. PackPoint users complained about forced workflows and UI complexity.
app_ideas.differentiation: No trip planning, weather integration, or social features - just pure packing list functionality
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Premium templates for different trip types, cloud sync, and advanced organization features

app_ideas.name: Creative Nudge
app_ideas.signal_source: YouTube and web research: Users seek 'creativity incubator' apps with 'inspirational prompts like trigger words, quotes, questions and images' to overcome creative blocks
app_ideas.description: Minimal daily creative prompt app that sends one inspiring nudge per day. Discovery Mode: Practical Utility | Ship Profile: Client-only
app_ideas.target_user: Writers, artists, and creators struggling with consistent creative output
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Writers report needing 'daily creative prompts' and 'writer's block mitigation tools'. Existing solutions like Brainsparker offer '200+ ideas' but users want focused, not overwhelming, inspiration.
app_ideas.differentiation: One prompt per day maximum - prevents overwhelm and decision paralysis
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Premium prompt categories, historical prompt access, and custom prompt creation

app_ideas.name: Home Dots
app_ideas.signal_source: Home organization app feedback: Users find current solutions 'too complicated' and prefer 'simple customizable' approaches over complex systems
app_ideas.description: Visual dot-based system for tracking household tasks and routines. Discovery Mode: Practical Utility | Ship Profile: Client-only
app_ideas.target_user: Busy families needing simple household organization without complex systems
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Home organization apps criticized for 'extensive customization' that's 'overwhelming for casual users'. Users want 'hassle-free' solutions with 'necessary features without unnecessary complexity'.
app_ideas.differentiation: Visual dot system instead of complex task management - inspired by simple reward charts
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Family sharing, custom categories, and progress insights

pricing.trial_strategy: Free version with 3 tasks, premium for unlimited

app_ideas.name: Simple Timer Kids
app_ideas.signal_source: Parent feedback: 'Timer apps for kids need to be fun and easy-to-use' and parents seek 'uncomplicated, child-friendly interfaces' for time management
app_ideas.description: Big button timer app designed specifically for kids with fun animations and simple controls. Discovery Mode: Kids/Family | Ship Profile: Offline-first
app_ideas.target_user: Parents of children aged 4-10 needing simple time management tools
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Existing timer apps are 'overwhelmingly complex' for children. Parents want 'visual timers' that are 'engaging for little ones' without complicated features.
app_ideas.differentiation: Designed by parents for kids - no complex settings, just big buttons and fun animations
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Additional timer themes, custom sounds, and parent controls

pricing.trial_strategy: Free with basic timer, premium for themes

app_ideas.name: MealSimple
app_ideas.signal_source: App Store reviews: Meal planning apps are 'overwhelmingly complicated' and users face 'decision paralysis' from 'too many recipes'. Users want 'no-frills, lowest cost' solutions
app_ideas.description: Minimalist meal planning with just 7 simple meal slots per week. Discovery Mode: Practical Utility | Ship Profile: Client-only
app_ideas.target_user: Busy individuals overwhelmed by complex meal planning apps
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Samsung Food users find it 'annoyingly complicated to navigate'. Eat This Much feels 'overwhelming' with too much editing required. Users want meal planning that 'simplifies, not complicates'.
app_ideas.differentiation: Only 7 meal slots maximum - prevents decision overload and keeps planning simple
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Recipe suggestions, shopping list optimization, and meal history

pricing.trial_strategy: Free with 3 meals, premium for full week

app_ideas.name: Word Practice
app_ideas.signal_source: Language learning app research shows demand for 'offline' functionality and 'simple' learning approaches without overwhelming features
app_ideas.description: Offline vocabulary practice app focusing on micro-learning sessions. Discovery Mode: Practical Utility | Ship Profile: Offline-first
app_ideas.target_user: Language learners wanting consistent vocabulary practice without internet dependency
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Language learners seek 'offline flashcards app' and 'study app no internet' options. Current solutions require constant connectivity or are overly complex.
app_ideas.differentiation: Fully offline with pre-downloaded content - works anywhere without internet
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Premium language packs, advanced analytics, and custom word lists

pricing.trial_strategy: Free starter pack, premium for additional languages

app_ideas.name: Quick Note Capture
app_ideas.signal_source: Chrome extension reviews highlight demand for 'simple single-purpose' utilities that 'do one thing well' rather than feature-heavy note apps
app_ideas.description: Lightning-fast note capture with one-tap save. Discovery Mode: Practical Utility | Ship Profile: Client-only
app_ideas.target_user: Professionals and students needing immediate thought capture without app complexity
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Users value extensions that 'save time and effort and streamline tasks' over comprehensive note-taking systems. Simple utilities consistently rated higher than complex alternatives.
app_ideas.differentiation: Sub-2-second note capture time - optimized for speed over features
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Cloud backup, voice-to-text, and advanced search capabilities

pricing.trial_strategy: Free with local storage, premium for cloud sync

app_ideas.name: Travel Essential
app_ideas.signal_source: Travel app reviews show users want 'offline' functionality and 'simple' tools. Extension store users seek 'tiny app' solutions for specific travel needs
app_ideas.description: Offline travel helper with essential conversion and reference tools. Discovery Mode: Practical Utility | Ship Profile: Offline-first
app_ideas.target_user: International travelers needing basic tools without internet dependency
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Travelers seek 'works on airplane' apps and 'simple travel utilities'. Current comprehensive travel apps are too complex for basic needs like conversions and references.
core_loop: Use unit conversions and time zones
app_ideas.differentiation: Essential travel tools only - no booking, planning, or social features
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Additional country data, advanced converters, and custom phrase lists

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic version, premium for all countries

app_ideas.name: Focus Dot
app_ideas.signal_source: Simple utility demand shows users want 'single-purpose' tools. Timer app success demonstrates preference for 'straightforward' focus aids
app_ideas.description: Minimalist focus timer with just a growing dot visualization. Discovery Mode: Playful/Meme | Ship Profile: Client-only
app_ideas.target_user: Anyone needing simple focus sessions without complex productivity systems
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Focus apps are often 'overwhelming' with features. Users prefer 'simple start and stop timer' functionality like successful Pomodoro extensions.
app_ideas.differentiation: Just a growing dot - no stats, settings, or complexity. Pure visual focus aid
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Custom dot styles, background sounds, and session insights

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic dot, premium for customization

app_ideas.name: Family Chore Simple
app_ideas.signal_source: Parenting forum feedback shows demand for 'simple chore chart app' and complaints about existing apps being 'too complicated' for family use
app_ideas.description: Dead-simple chore tracking for families with visual progress indicators. Discovery Mode: Kids/Family | Ship Profile: Client-only
app_ideas.target_user: Parents with children aged 6-14 needing straightforward chore management
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Parents seek 'reward chart app for kids' that's not overwhelming. Timer apps succeed when they're 'fun and easy-to-use' rather than feature-rich.
app_ideas.differentiation: No points, levels, or complex rewards - just simple completion tracking
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Multiple families, custom chores, and achievement celebrations

pricing.trial_strategy: Free for single family, premium for extended features
